column2: As a farmer  I can refresh the predicted weather
column3: As a farmer I can CRUD plots
column4: As a farmer with a plot I can edit the parameters of a plot (current season)
column5: As a farmer with a plot I can sort my plots in the list
column6: As a farmer with a plot I can filter my plots in the list
column7: As a farmer with a plot I can export observation data for a plot
column8: As a farmer with a plot I know when my plots will be in danger
column9: As a farmer irrigator I can manage my irrigations and recommendations in my favorite unit
column10: As a farmer irrigator I choose my preferred irrigation unit in my user-settings
column11: As a farmer irrigator I can view my irrigation recommendations in my favorite unit
column12: As a admin I can CRUD a farmer
column13: As a admin I can relaunch all failed simulation
